name: Emergency Island
description:
In this game you have to dodge enemies on a platform. Move the character, a very cute bird, by clicking on the map or holding down your mouse-button. By doing so you can dodge the very evil enemies. Some of them follow you and some others just fall from the sky, but everybody wants to kill you, so beware.

To survive longer you can collect items which give you an advantage for a short amount of time. For example there are shields, healing and other helpful things.

Try to achieve the highest score and if you are playing the downloaded version you can even be listed on a global highscore, where you compete with others all over the world. Can you get the crown?

Have fun with Emergency Island!

Made by Toasted Games
